snippet: An Israeli mother and three children were seriously injured in a car crash in the West Bank on Thursday after stones thrown by Palestinians apparently hit their vehicle, the police said.
abstract: Israeli mother and three children are seriously injured in car crash in West Bank  after stones thrown by Palestinians apparently hit their vehicle.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli mother and three children were seriously injured in a car crash in the West Bank on Thursday after stones thrown by Palestinians apparently hit their vehicle, the police said.

headline.main: Israel: Tensions Mount in West Bank
headline.print_headline: Israel: Tensions Mount in West Bank
